wtomigraj

Class Receiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtomigraj.Receiver

  • public class Receiver
extends java.lang.Object
    Class designated for listening on one DatagramSocket for incoming packets. It does not confirm received packets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Receiver(java.net.DatagramSocket ds)
      Creates receiver which will listen on given socket.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl)
      Adds PropertyChangeListener.
      void close()
      Closes socket and turns off thread listening for incoming datagrams.
      java.net.DatagramSocket getDs()
      Returns socket object on which this receiver listens.
      java.lang.Thread getListening()
      Returns thread object which listens on socket.
      void startListening()
      Creates thread for handling arriving datagrams.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
